ModMetaData.name: Hot Coffee
ModMetaData.author: Toasty, Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
Adds coffee related stuff and things! I don't know how these workers got up before!
- Assign different types of coffee for consumption via the Assign tab Drug Policies. *(You might need to create a new drug policy to show coffee)
- Two new production machines: the electric coffee machine and the decaffeination machine.
- Adds a coffee plant, which requires a growing skill of 5 and produces raw coffee beans.
- Four variations of coffee beans, prepared by cooking or using a special machine.
- Different types of coffee with varying effects, research requirements and preparation techniques.
- Coffee keeps your colonists awake! Think of it as a safer, weaker WakeUp.
- Buzz coffee gives colonists a boost to working capabilities, but is risky to consume long-term.
- Sweet decaf coffee makes colonists happy! Be careful about over-consumption, though...
